pages.text: This hollowed out dragon egg is the perfect home for the $(l:bees/types/bees_wild/draconic)Draconic Bee$(/l). You can find Draconic Bees in obsidian nests in the end. This hive does not support $(l:blocks/hives/expansion_boxes)Expansion Boxes$(/l), and thus no upgrades.

When located in the end, the bees inside the hive do not need a separate pollination source. They can simply use their hive to produce combs. When operating outside the end however, they will need a different pollination source. Like the $(l:blocks/hives/advanced_hives)Advanced Beehive$(/l), it supports hoppers and pipes to get the items out.
